Another Poverty Bay Women’s Golf Open title to McDonald https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/09/18/another-poverty-bay-womens-golf-open-title-to-mcdonald/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/09/18/another-poverty-bay-womens-golf-open-title-to-mcdonald/ Chris TaewaTop seed too good for Omanu's Noble in matchplay final Tue, 17 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Tessa McDonald collected her fourth Poverty Bay Women's Open title on her home Awapuni Links course yesterday. McDonald beat Omanu's Debbie Noble 4 and 3 in the division 1 matchplay final.
